columns.name: name
columns.description: The name of a Security Hub insight.

columns.name: arn
columns.description: The ARN of a Security Hub insight.

columns.name: group_by_attribute
columns.description: The grouping attribute for the insight's findings. Indicates how to group the matching findings,and identifies the type of item that the insight applies to. For example, if an insight is grouped by resource identifier, then the insight produces a list of resource identifiers.

columns.name: filters
columns.description: One or more attributes used to filter the findings included in the insight. The insight only includes findings that match the criteria defined in the filters.
